lead_paragraph: Barbara Farris scored on a rebound with 1.7 seconds remaining last night to give the host Liberty a 64-62 W.N.B.A victory against Charlotte. Becky Hammon, starting for the first time since July 9, scored 15 points for the Liberty (10-23).
